summary: TAIL LIGHT ASSY KEEPS CRACKING ON THE UPPER LEFT BOLT,  I AM ON MY 4TH TAIL LIGHT AND IT IS ALSO BROKEN.  ON THE SAME ASSY THE TURN LIGHT STALKS CAN BRAKE OFF AND JUST HANG BY THE WIRES,  THIS HAS HAPPEN TWICE TO ME.  ON THE FRONT TURN SIGNAL THE LEFT TURN LIGHT BROKE OFF AND WAS HANGING BY THE WIRES,  THIS HAS HAPPEN TWICE TO ME AND IS STILL BROKEN AT THIS TIME,  TEMP FIX WITH A HOSE CLAMP.   *NLM
